detials: I completed my BE in Computer Science and Engineering at Agni College of Technology. During my time there, I gained a strong foundation in computer science principles and honed my skills in various programming languages and technologies. I participated in several projects, internships, and workshops that enriched my learning experience and prepared me for a career in software development.

school: Sri Venkateshwara A1 Matric Higher Secondary School
detials: I pursued my Higher Secondary Education at Sri Venkateshwara A1 Matric Higher Secondary School. My focus was on the science stream, where I developed a keen interest in mathematics and computer science. The rigorous curriculum and supportive faculty helped me excel academically and cultivate a passion for technology.

I completed my Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) at Maruthi Higher Secondary School. This phase of my education laid the groundwork for my future academic endeavors. I was actively involved in various extracurricular activities, which helped me develop essential skills such as teamwork, leadership, and communication.
